markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Tarantula](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3208)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Tarantulas are ambush predators but will attack prey in the open.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Giant Tarantula](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3208)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 321 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +1

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 135

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +17,
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus giant tarantula venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
leg +17 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d12+8 bludgeoning plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=46)

**Giant Tarantula Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 23 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 8 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d10 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d12 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61), and [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and off-guard (1 round); **Stage 4** 2d6 poison damage and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) (1 round)

**Hair Barrage** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The tarantula flicks its legs, flinging spiky hairs in a 15-foot cone. This deals 4d6 piercing damage with a DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-474" />
name: Giant Tarantula

text: Giant Tarantula Tarantulas are ambush predators but will attack prey in the open. Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Giant Tarantula Source Monster Core pg. 321 1.1 Perception +14; darkvision Languages Skills Acrobatics +9, Athletics +16, Stealth +11 Str +6 Dex +1 Con +5 Int -5 Wis +2 Cha -4 --- AC 21 Fort +15 Ref +13 Will +10 HP 135 --- Speed 30 feet, climb 30 feet Melee Single Action fangs +17, Damage 2d8+8 piercing plus giant tarantula venom Melee Single Action leg +17 (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d12+8 bludgeoning plus Knockdown Giant Tarantula Venom (Poison) Saving Throw DC 23 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 8 rounds; Stage 1 1d10 poison damage (1 round); Stage 2 1d12 poison damage, clumsy 1, and off-guard (1 round); Stage 3 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and off-guard (1 round); Stage 4 2d6 poison damage and paralyzed (1 round) Hair Barrage Two Actions The tarantula flicks its legs, flinging spiky hairs in a 15-foot cone. This deals 4d6 piercing damage with a DC 25 basic Reflex save.
